mapper.select: select bc.id id, bc.name, bc.intro, bc.background_image, bc.background_color, count(distinct bcl.user_id) contributorsCount ,count(distinct bcl.book_id) itemsCount, bc.expiration_date, bc.create_date, bc.update_date from book_collection_tb bc right join book_collection_list_tb bcl on bc.id = bcl.collection_id where bc.id = #{collectionId} and bc.state = 1 and bc.expiration_date >= now()

select bcl.id recommendId, bcl.`comment`, bcl.create_date recommendCreateDate, bcl.update_date recommendUpdateDate,
count(if(a.user_id= #{userId},1,null)) isApplaud,
b.id bookId, b.name bookName, b.author, b.cover bookCover, b.douban_rate, u.id userId,u.name userName,u.wx_name, u.cover userCover, count(a.recommend_id) applaud from book_collection_list_tb bcl left join books_tb b on bcl.book_id = b.id left join users_tb u on bcl.user_id = u.id left join applaud_tb a on a.recommend_id = bcl.id where bcl.id = #{recommendId} group by bcl.id
mapper.update: update book_collection_list_tb set update_date = now() where id = #{id}
